member.name: M:StatefulClass1.Func1(Record1,Record1)
member.summary: A method to process two Record1 instances. This method is registered for use with a delegate.
member.returns: A string representation of the processed data.

member.name: M:StatefulClass1.Func2
member.summary: A method that performs an action without returning a value.

member.name: M:StatefulClass1.Func3(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that takes primitive parameters and returns their sum.
member.returns: The sum of the two integers.

member.name: M:StatefulClass1.Func4(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Record1})
member.summary: A method that takes a collection of Record1 and returns a collection of strings.
member.returns: A collection of processed string representations of the input records.
